info.description: This API Provides Services to the New Allpoint Mobile Application
info.title: Allpoint Mobile Services API

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Allpoint API Services consumer must authenticate themselves

get.description: Returns a one-time use API Key that will expire after the first use

400.description: Bad Request. Unspecified error due to the request being invalid.

403.description: Access denied. The client is not authorized to use the API.

404.description: Not Found. There is no such API at the given request URL.

500.description: Internal Failure. Unspecified error occurred on the server.

get.description: Check if the given BIN belongs to Allpoint Network

parameters.description: Authorization Token that was issued before

404.description: Not Found. There is no such API at the given request URL.

get.description: get all the important details of the requested location and the terminal
